name: kuksa-event-api-client
description: Client for the kuksa api for event information.

scripts.preversion: [[ $(git branch | grep '*' | cut -c 3-) = master ]] && rm -rf release kuksa-event-api-client.tar.gz
scripts.version: npm run build && mkdir release && cp -r dist package.json README.md release/ && tar -cf kuksa-event-api-client.tar.gz release/
scripts.postversion: rm -rf release && git push && git push --tags
